definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Too many magazines like to feature sleek models on the cover.
sentences.chinese: 太多的杂志喜欢用时尚模特儿作封面。

sentences.english: It’s illegal to change the clothes on a storefront mannequin unless you draw the shades first.
sentences.chinese: 给前店的人体模特儿换衣服时必须有遮挡，否则违法。

sentences.english: Shanghai Painting Art Academy uses nude model in its classes.
sentences.chinese: 上海图画美术院在教学中使用人体模特儿。

sentences.english: Imes picked Rose from all the beautiful girls in the school to be a model.
sentences.chinese: 艾姆斯从全校那些美丽的女孩子中选中露丝做模特儿。

sentences.english: Long-stemmed models ankled though the lobby.
sentences.chinese: 身材修长的模特儿袅袅婷婷地走过大厅。

sentences.english: Many young girls dream of being a fashelloon model.
sentences.chinese: 许多年青女性梦想成为服装模特儿。

sentences.english: The rakish actor was known for dating models.
sentences.chinese: 那位风流倜傥的演员爱跟模特儿交往是出了名的。

sentences.english: The supermodels were the first professional models to break out of fashion.
sentences.chinese: 超级名模是时尚产生的第一代职业模特儿。

sentences.english: I must call Behrman up to be my model for the old miner.
sentences.chinese: 我得叫贝尔曼上楼来给我当老矿工模特儿。

sentences.english: She is modeling Donna Karan's fall collection of skirts.
sentences.chinese: 她正为唐娜卡兰的秋季系列女裙展览当模特儿。

sentences.english: Using model opportunely is the arty when Fan Saizhe creates technique one kind.
sentences.chinese: 巧用模特儿是范思哲时装艺术的一种创作手法。

sentences.english: He hastily snatched up a nightdress, leapt onto the catwalk and handed it to the model.
sentences.chinese: 他匆匆抓起一件睡衣，跳上T台，把它递给模特儿。

sentences.english: Kim began her career in entertainment as a model.
sentences.chinese: 金泰熙是作为一个模特儿来开始她的娱乐职业生涯。

sentences.english: She left school to go to work as a dress model in the garment company.
sentences.chinese: 她离开学校到服装公司当时装模特儿。

sentences.english: The model posed herself for the art students.
sentences.chinese: 模特儿摆好了姿势让美术专业的学生临摹。

sentences.english: No pair of jeans is going to make me look like the 18-year-old models in the mural.
sentences.chinese: 没有一条牛仔裤让我穿起来像壁画里18岁的模特儿。

definition: Matou town in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
a fashion show/to walk the runway (in a fashion show)
photobook (loanword from Japanese), generally sexy portraits of an actress or model
